og-awards.topicdesc: Two adaptations of the 'Joker' origin story sit on either side of the 1999-2000 changeover
No longer youth and not yet old, two exceptional young people lead others into the unknown
Is companionship the only reality or the only illusion?
Plasma projections persist as the penultimate power of the perfect, penitent & perky PC

When a cold wind blows it chills you -- chills you to the bone. But there's nothing in nature that freezes your heart like years of being alone. It paints you with indifference like a lady paints with rouge -- and the worst of the worst, the most hated and cursed, is the one that we call Scrooge.
If we teach a machine how to love, we must prepare for the eventuality that they succeed
Both are adventure stories about ordinary (people) pursuing meaningful changes to their society

og-awards.name1: all Good Dogs Go to Heaven (movie)
og-awards.topicdesc: the fetishization of the Foreign takes 'He of the Nose' around the world and back again
Youth is Wasted on the Yuppie
